title: Iggie's House
description: Winnie Barringer can't help feeling lonely ever since her best friend, Iggie, moved away. How will she make it through summer vacation?Then a new family moves into Iggie's house, and Winnie is thrilled. She hopes Glenn, Herbie, and Tina Garber will all want to be her friends.But the Garbers are the first black family on an all-white block. Will that stand in the way of their friendship?
author: Judy Blume
